moreBlocks.otherOffices: The Walker Firm (Main Office) 17 East Airy Street Norristown, PA 19401 610-936-6833

description:
Located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, The Walker Firm provides a full range of quality, effective legal counsel to clients throughout the area who have needs involving any of the following:

  • Criminal defense for all types of felonies and misdemeanors, including DUI, drug crimes, violent crimes and more
  • Discrimination and other violations of our clients' constitutional rights
  • Personal injury
  • Complex torts
  • Real estate law

With a history that dates back to 2007, our law firm has served the individuals and families of Pennsylvania for more than 13 years. During this time, we have grown to include an additional law office in Norristown, and we have gained a reputation for delivering strategic, thoughtful representation to all we serve.

Our law firm's founder, attorney Michael A. Walker, established our practice with a mission to deliver the highest level of counsel and support with the utmost integrity and passion. Possessing many years of successful litigation experience, Mr. Walker has the skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently and cost-effectively. Furthermore, he has earned Top 100 Trial Lawyer designations from the National Trial Lawyers along with many other top rankings and endorsements from his peers.

This means you can expect to receive the quality counsel you deserve directly from a local attorney who has your best interests at heart and who will fight aggressively to improve your likelihood for a successful outcome. To find out more, you can contact The Walker Firm to schedule a free initial consultation, and our law office offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your family safe.
